bin

Class TransactionManage

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.AppData
      • bin.TransactionManage

  • public class TransactionManage
extends AppData
    Control Class Manage the generation, text output, quires and analysis of transactions.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static int NOT_EXPIRED
      the value transmit to the interface which means the user's usage did not expired
      private static int SINGLE_EXPIRED
      the value transmit to the interface which means the user's usage got a single expired
      private static int SINGLE_TIME
      the single maximum use time of a user (in seconds)
      private static int TOTAL_EXPIRED
      the value transmit to the interface which means the user's usage got a total expired
      private static int TOTAL_TIME
      the total maximum use time of a user (in seconds)

      • TransactionManage

    • Method Detail

      • generateTransaction

        static void generateTransaction(java.lang.String type)
        Generate a transaction based on current user, scooter and time The transaction can only created when the user is holding the scooter
        Parameters:
        type - transaction type

      • checkIfExpired

        public static int checkIfExpired()
        Check if the user's usage has expired by analyzing it's transactions
        Returns:
        0: not expired, 1: single usage expired, 2: total usage expired

      • ifSingleTimeExpired

        private static boolean ifSingleTimeExpired()
        Check if the used have got a single time expiry The maximum single usage time is based on the const SINGLE_EXPIRED.
        Returns:
        true: single time expired, false: not single time expired

      • ifTotalExpired

        private static boolean ifTotalExpired()
        Check if the used have got a total time expiry. The maximum total usage time is based on the const TOTAL_EXPIRED.
        Returns:
        true: total time expired, false: not total time expired

      • findTransactionsByUser

        private static java.util.ArrayList<Transaction> findTransactionsByUser()
        Output all transactions of the current usera
        Returns:
        All the transactions of the current user, ordered by transaction time

      • getAllTransactions

        public static java.lang.String[][] getAllTransactions()
        Output all transactions for displaying on the interface.
        Returns:
        All transaction information to be displayed on the interface

      • getUserTransactions

        public static java.lang.String[][] getUserTransactions(int id)
        Output all transactions of the specific user for displaying on the interface.
        Parameters:
        id - user id
        Returns:
        All transaction information of the specific user
